channel.title: Homes on Karttikeya Mangalam
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Karttikeya Mangalam

item.description: About Me I’m a graduate student in Computer Science at Stanford University working with Prof. Juan Carlos and Prof. Fei Fei Li in the Stanford Vision Lab. Recently, I was a research intern at the reputed Montreal Institute of Learning Algorithms (MILA) where I was tackling the problem of Rationalization in Natural Language Processing guided by Prof. Alain Tapp. My research interests lie in Egocentric Computer Vision and Artificial General Intelligence.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: I have worked as a Academic mentor in Counselling Service, IITK for PHY102 : Introduction to Mechanics in my sophomore year (2015 - 2016) in IIT Kanpur. I was responsible for providing academic support to freshmen in terms of one-on-one mentoring and remedial classes for concept strengtening, problem solving and revision.
